data.message: I may like Facebook but I am deleting the messenger app and I will not be using that. Do you hear me Mark?

replies.message: Hi Claudia.  We're working hard to improve the Messenger experience for everyone. If there's something that we could do to improve your experience, please let us know at: http://on.fb.me/V80EwI. - Elissa

You don't need to know everything. You don't need to know who I call or for how long. You don't need access to my email. And you especially do NOT need access to my camera or microphone. If that's the price of having messenger you can forget it.
Wrong, Claudia, wrong. They need to know everything so they can sell it to the highest bidder.

I notice that you (facebook) have the same reply for complaints on your page. Do you really mean what you are saying? I think that our complaints and observation is the "something" you mean so that we could improve our experience... Are you gonna continue the "Messenger" thing?
